General_information.Content: This database contains data from international key comparisons for radionuclide metrology since the inception of the international system of reference (SIR) for radionuclide metrology at the BIPM in 1976.

References.key: Romain Coulon et al 2022 Meas. Sci. Technol. 33 024003 - https://doi.org/10.1088/1361-6501/ac3fc4

key.name: Key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Ac-225(2021)
key.Reference_of_the_published_comparison_re: Michotte C., Courte S., Nonis M., Coulon R., Judge S., Kossert K., N\"ahle O., Final report of the new BIPM comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Ac-225 of activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{225}$Ac to include the 2019 result of the PTB (Germany), \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/58/1A/06018}{\textit{Metrologia}, 2021, \textbf{58}, Tech. Suppl., 06018}

key.name: Key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Ac-225(2022)
key.Reference_of_the_published_comparison_re: Coulon R., Michotte C., Courte S., Nonis M., Ziemek T, Marganiec-Ga\l{}\c{a}zka J., Lech E., Saganowski P., Czudek M., Listkowska A., Update of the BIPM comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1.Ac-225 of activity measurements of the radionuclide $^{225}$Ac to include the 2021 result of the POLATOM (Poland), \href{https://doi.org/10.1088/0026-1394/60/1A/06001}{\textit{Metrologia}, 2023, \textbf{60}, Tech. Suppl., 06001}

key.name: Eligible for the Key Comparison Reference Value (KCRV)

Laboratory.Full_name: National Centre for Nuclear Research Radioisotope Centre POLATOM

Data_from_POLATOM-2021.key: T. Ziemek, J. Marganiec-Ga\l{}\c{a}zka, E. Lech, P. Saganowski, M. Czudek, A. Listkowska

The TDCR method was used in the 4pi(LS)-gamma coincidence system (TDCRG) with TDCR detector in the beta channel~\cite{Ziemek2016}. The result is the weighted mean of these two measurement systems evaluated by POLATOM and is equal to 2023(5) kBq.
Data_from_POLATOM-2021.Particularities_of_the_submission_to_the: 1 sample and average of several measurement methods

key.name: Activity measured by the laboratory / kBq
Date of the measurement by the BIPM international reference system (SIR)
Half-life used by the laboratory / d

Data_from_POLATOM-2021.Reference_for_the_decay_data_used_by_the: S. Pomm\'e et al. \href{https://doi.org/10.1016/j.apradiso.2012.07.014}{\textit{Appl. Radiat. Isot.}, \textbf{70} 2012, 2608-2614}
Data_from_POLATOM-2021.Comments_on_impurities_contained_into_th: Radioactive solution was measured on gamma spectrometer using HPGe detector. No impurities were detected in the solution.

key.name: Equivalent activity measured by the SIR / kBq
Relative standard uncertainty (SIR contribution) of the equivalent activity / 1e-4
Combined standard uncertainty of the equivalent activity / kBq
Initials of the person(s) who verified the data plus the date

Data_from_POLATOM-2021.Status_of_the_data: Published with the key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1

key.name: Eligible for the Key Comparison Reference Value (KCRV)

Data_from_PTB-2019.key: C. Michotte, S. Courte, M. Nonis, R. Coulon, S. Judge

key.name: Activity measured by the laboratory / kBq
Date of the measurement by the BIPM international reference system (SIR)
Half-life used by the laboratory / d

Data_from_PTB-2019.Comments_on_impurities_contained_into_th: Impurity not at equilibrium; correction for the SIR measurement assuming the source production date is equal to the reference date

key.name: Equivalent activity measured by the SIR / kBq
Relative standard uncertainty (SIR contribution) of the equivalent activity / 1e-4
Combined standard uncertainty of the equivalent activity / kBq
Initials of the person(s) who verified the data plus the date

Data_from_PTB-2019.Status_of_the_data: Published with the key comparison BIPM.RI(II)-K1
